00024 class DHTML_Calendar {

00032 
00033     function DHTML_Calendar($calendar_lib_path = '/calendar/',
00034                             $lang              = 'en',
00035                             $theme             = 'calendar-win2k-1',
00036                             $stripped          = true) {
00037         if ($stripped) {
00038             $this->calendar_file = 'calendar_stripped.js';
00039             $this->calendar_setup_file = 'calendar-setup_stripped.js';
00040         } else {
00041             $this->calendar_file = 'calendar.js';
00042             $this->calendar_setup_file = 'calendar-setup.js';
00043         }
00044         $this->calendar_lang_file = 'lang/calendar-' . $lang . '.js';
00045         $this->calendar_theme_file = $theme.'.css';
00046         $this->calendar_lib_path = preg_replace('/\/+$/', '/', $calendar_lib_path);
00047         $this->calendar_options = array('ifFormat' => '%Y/%m/%d',
00048                                         'daFormat' => '%Y/%m/%d');
00049     }
00050 
00051     function set_option($name, $value) {
00052         $this->calendar_options[$name] = $value;
00053     }
00054 
00055     function load_files() {
00056         echo $this->get_load_files_code();
00057     }
00058 
00059     function get_load_files_code() {
00060         $code  = ( '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" href="' .
00061                    $this->calendar_lib_path . $this->calendar_theme_file .
00062                    '" />' . NEWLINE );
00063         $code .= ( '<script type="text/javascript" src="' .
00064                    $this->calendar_lib_path . $this->calendar_file .
00065                    '"></script>' . NEWLINE );
00066         $code .= ( '<script type="text/javascript" src="' .
00067                    $this->calendar_lib_path . $this->calendar_lang_file .
00068                    '"></script>' . NEWLINE );
00069         $code .= ( '<script type="text/javascript" src="' .
00070                    $this->calendar_lib_path . $this->calendar_setup_file .
00071                    '"></script>' );
00072         return $code;
00073     }
00074 
00075     function _make_calendar($other_options = array()) {
00076         $js_options = $this->_make_js_hash(array_merge($this->calendar_options, $other_options));
00077         $code  = ( '<script type="text/javascript">Calendar.setup({' .
00078                    $js_options .
00079                    '});</script>' );
00080         return $code;
00081     }
00082 
00083     function make_input_field($cal_options = array(), $field_attributes = array()) {
00084         $id = $this->_gen_id();
00085         $attrstr = $this->_make_html_attr(array_merge($field_attributes,
00086                                                       array('id'   => $this->_field_id($id),
00087                                                             'type' => 'text')));
00088         echo '<input ' . $attrstr .'/>';
00089         echo '<a href="#" id="'. $this->_trigger_id($id) . '">' .
00090             '<img align="middle" border="0" src="' . $this->calendar_lib_path . 'img.gif" alt="" /></a>';
00091 
00092         $options = array_merge($cal_options,
00093                                array('inputField' => $this->_field_id($id),
00094                                      'button'     => $this->_trigger_id($id)));
00095         echo $this->_make_calendar($options);
00096     }

00099 
00100     function _field_id($id) { return 'f-calendar-field-' . $id; }
00101     function _trigger_id($id) { return 'f-calendar-trigger-' . $id; }
00102     function _gen_id() { static $id = 0; return ++$id; }
00103 
00104     function _make_js_hash($array) {
00105         $jstr = '';
00106         reset($array);
00107         while (list($key, $val) = each($array)) {
00108             if (is_bool($val))
00109                 $val = $val ? 'true' : 'false';
00110             else if (!is_numeric($val))
00111                 $val = '"'.$val.'"';
00112             if ($jstr) $jstr .= ',';
00113             $jstr .= '"' . $key . '":' . $val;
00114         }
00115         return $jstr;
00116     }
00117 
00118     function _make_html_attr($array) {
00119         $attrstr = '';
00120         reset($array);
00121         while (list($key, $val) = each($array)) {
00122             $attrstr .= $key . '="' . $val . '" ';
00123         }
00124         return $attrstr;
00125     }
00126 };
